## CurrentGame.id property

The numerical ID of the game.

Combining this with the [CurrentGame.platform](./shieldbow.currentgame.platform.md) gives the full ID of the game. The full ID can be used to fetch all the details of the match after it has ended using [MatchManager.fetch()](./shieldbow.matchmanager.fetch.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly id: number;
```
